name: df-eeng
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ceeng, cmpt(s0, cn, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cee, cv(s0))), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cee, cv(s0)), cfv(cee, cv(s0)), csu(s3, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cexp, nat2))))), cpr(cop(cfv(citv, cnx), cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cee, cv(s0)), cfv(cee, cv(s0)), crab(s4, cfv(cee, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s4), cbtwn, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), cop(cfv(clng, cnx), cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cee, cv(s0)), cdif(cfv(cee, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1))), crab(s4, cfv(cee, cv(s0)), w3o(wbr(cv(s4), cbtwn, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cbtwn, cop(cv(s4), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cbtwn, cop(cv(s1), cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define the geometry structure for ` EE ^ N ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Aug-2017.)
